title: ContactPoint
description: A contact point—for example, a Customer Complaints department.

availableLanguage.description: A language someone may use with or at the item, service or place. Please use one of the language codes from the [IETF BCP 47 standard](http://tools.ietf.org/html/bcp47). See also [[inLanguage]].

contactType.description: A person or organization can have different contact points, for different purposes. For example, a sales contact point, a PR contact point and so on. This property is used to specify the kind of contact point.

contactOption.description: An option available on this contact point (e.g. a toll-free number or support for hearing-impaired callers).

hoursAvailable.description: The hours during which this service or contact is available.

productSupported.description: The product or service this support contact point is related to (such as product support for a particular product line). This can be a specific product or product line (e.g. "iPhone") or a general category of products or services (e.g. "smartphones").

areaServed.description: The geographic area where a service or offered item is provided.
